answers.answer: It's hard to tell. Even the estimated weight that they give you can be out. A lot depends on family history, your health and any medical factor that can contribute... Eg gestational diabetes. I wouldn't worry too much. Sounds like  bub is nice and healthy.And I've also heard that its easier to birth a bigger baby than a small one. My boy was 8lb 13oz and I had no problems with him.Don't stress! Xx
My first was 6 11.4 and I ripped bad.... So I don't want that to happen again
Also I have only gained 11 lbs my whole pregnancy
The baby will gain roughly 1/2 a pound each week between now and birth. So I don't think she will be huge. No worries :)
Mine was 6 lbs at 35 weeks so I'm betting your baby will be average size about 7lbs. Mines predicted at 7 1/2 to 8lbs. You'll be fine she's a good weight
Yeah mine was 6lb at 35wks so yours won't be too big

I'm 39 weeks now. N a couple of weeks ago my baby was weighing at 6 pounds. My first daughter born at 38 weeks n she weighed 6.6oz when she was born. So I doubt if this baby girl will be big. Bcus I normally have small babies. Don't worry to much I'm sure everything will be fine:-)

question: Will she be big?
title: 35 week's and baby girl is 5 lbs
